transcription:
IT’S BEET WEEK,
 And everyone’s excited!
 The trains are napping
 in the yard, but
 they, too, are delighted.
 
 The village buzzes with glee –
 no hexes to be found –
 so offer up your queries
 and cycle on down
 
 to the town square
 where a woman now sits lonely
 awaiting sunset silverwares
 when she won’t be the only
 hungry fellow there.
 
 Oh, no – we will pound on all the tables
 and dent their matte veneers
 thin of belly, thick of heart,
 deafening powerful ears –
 Alpha beta goodness gracious!
 We must demand our hams!
 And make it plain
 that on each day
 we’ll cage up our captors
 and slurp our fancy jams.
